item.description:
Hello Everyone,

MODIFICATION TO MEETUP - meetup starts at 1PM! (alternative in case of a large turnout in original meetup below).

BECAUSE OF THE LARGE TURNOUT, AND WE JUST GOT A GIG FOR A VALENTINE'S DANCE HAITI BENEFIT WE NEED TO REHEARSE FOR -

MEETUP WILL HAVE TWO PARTS:

1) Regular meetup for everyone starting at 1PM
2) Rehearsal for Haiti Benefit for participants starting around 4PM

Sorry for any inconvenience, but part of the goal of the group is to get out and play, and this is a great opportunity - and the gig is a week away!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will have another Jam/rehearsal session this Sunday Feb 7th 1PM

Also, I auditioned for and am now the keyboard player of the House Band of an Open Mike at a local Nitespot. Once things are settled in, in about two weeks, I will make it a weekly meetup, so you can come out & play. It's low pressure, but start practicing!

The Agenda of the meetups are:

1) Record a CD of originals & possibly covers.
2) As soon as we have enough material rehearsed, we will have a local show.
3) We will also be going to open Mikes in the meantime.

We will sequence the agenda based on interests, so please answer questions on your interests & goals. If there are lot of people, we will split the group into two, Group 1 from approx. 1PM until 4, and group to from approximately 4 until 7PM. Approximately is the operative word...

Also Important:
A Dance Party to Benefit HAITI Relief
Valentine’s Day and the To Haiti with Love fundraiser can be a fantastic memory. Money – lots and lots of money will be on the way to Haiti with your help
Do you know haw many 10 thousands of orphans are in Haiti now because of the quake?

If you would like to go to dance or volunteer, email:
Nancy M. McCabe
I will check to see if there is any way we could play some music there.

Nancy McCabe, Event Coordinator 617.549.3152
To HAITI with LOVE
A Dance Party to Benefit HAITI Relief
PLEASE HELP US SPREAD THE WORD
Saturday, Feb 13 7:30 - 10 PM
$20 Adults, $12 Students
First Church UU
404 Concord Avenue, Belmont

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam Rehearsal Recording Session #5
